text: Nathaniel Thomas Huffman (April 2, 1975 â€“ October 15, 2015) was an American professional basketball player. He played most of his career outside of the United States with Maccabi Tel Aviv. Huffman played for the Toronto Raptors from 2002 through 2003. On September 29, 2015, Huffman announced that he had stage 4 bladder cancer and his "condition is terminal". He died on October 15, 2015. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Michigan Category:Deaths from bladder cancer Category:People from Battle Creek, Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Toronto Raptors players
title: Nate Huffman
